links.*: The Lord of the Rings Appendices

wikitext.*:
'''Lars-Terje Lysemose''' (born [[1974]]) is a Danish journalist, editor and educator. A member of [[The Tolkien Society]] in the early 1990s, he founded what is now known as [[Imladris, Danmarks Tolkienforening]] (then, Danmarks Tolkienforening) together with [[Inge Søbæk]] in 1993.

He also became the editor for ''[[Athelas (journal)|Athelas]]'', the journal of the Society. As the [[The Lord of the Rings Appendices|Appendices]] were not included in the Danish edition of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'', Lysemose published a translation running through several issues of ''Athelas''.

In 1997, Lysemose moved to the United States and left the post as editor for ''Athelas''. Lysemose has lived in Sweden and is now back in Copenhagen.<ref>https://lysemose.com/in-english-2/</ref>
